name: Pixel Traffic: Highway Racing
description: Car arcade game in which you need to quickly maneuver in the dense traffic in the middle of the highway. Accelerate to the maximum speed and score as many points as possible!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 300 MB available space
